data.title: CCOWA Invoice/Receipt
data.htmlBody:
Thanks for your payment!

Your payment to CCOWA for <%= get('input.formTitle') %> has been succesful.

Your receipt from Square, our payment processor, is available here:

View your Invoice/Receipt

No GST is charged on convention registrations.
The payment will appear on your bank account as <%= get('input.statementDescription') %>

Problem?

For help with this payment, forward this email to <%= get('input.contactEmail') %>.

Christian Conventions of Western Australia
ABN 38 223 904 915
info@ccowa.org

Admin links: Form submission | Transaction

roles.title: Full Access
roles.firstLine: Grants access to Create, Edit, View and Delete almost every type of content in the system
